data.oai_dc:dc: The molecular detection and identification of facultative endosymbionts and parasitoids in field collected Sitobion avenae

The molecular detection and identification of facultative endosymbionts and parasitoids in field collected Sitobion avenae. Positive and negative detections are represented as “1” and “0”, respectively. Spaces are replaced using “_”.
host-parasitoid interactions|ecological networks|defensive symbiosis|parasitoid community|aphid|hyperparasitoid|food webs
